name: Block Puzzle Z
description:
Block Puzzle Z is a free block puzzle classic jewel and wooden style block puzzle game. It is based on the traditional type of woodblock puzzle but brings totally different game mode and experience to players. The game is easy to play but hard to master. To get a high score you need a clear mind and strategic thinking.

🤔Why choose this Block Puzzle Z?
★ No wifi needed. No time limit.
★ 100% free to play.
★ Easy to play but hard to master.
★ Multiple game modes (classic, bomb 💣, and timer ⏳ modes).
★ Classic game for all ages.
★ Beat your high score and train your brain.
★ Beautiful jewel blocks.
★ Play anytime and anywhere.

💡How to Play Puzzle Block Z Game?
* Place the block on the board 10x10.
* Fill blocks in vertical or horizontal lines to clear them.
* Eliminate more block jewel and score more points.
* Jewel block can't be rotated.

🔥 Challenge this addictive puzzle game and blast the jewel with the fastest speed.

Enjoy the addictive Block Puzzle Z, and become a master!
